analysis.key_quote: I strongly oppose the implementation or revival of “schedule F” for federal employees. This proposal would threaten the merit-based civil service system that has created over a century of non-partisan federal workforce.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the implementation of Schedule F, citing concerns about the erosion of the merit-based civil service system and the potential for politicization of federal employment. It emphasizes the importance of due process protections and the integrity of the civil service.
